14064.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Kekeke I finally found it.
A minstrel like no other.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14064.ja:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「ケケケ　見ーっけた。
　旅芸人っぽいヤツ。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14064.ko:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 케케케, 찾았다.
　유랑 예능인 같아 보이는 녀석.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14064.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>嘿嘿嘿，找到你啦。
像是旅行艺人的家伙。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14064.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>嘿嘿嘿，找到你啦。
像是旅行藝人的傢伙。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14065.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001> Kill, kill, kill them all♪
Kill, kill, kill them all♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14065.ja: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「皆殺し♪　皆殺し♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14065.ko: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 다 죽여야지♪ 다 죽여야지♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14065.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>全部杀死♪全部杀死♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14065.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>全部殺死♪全部殺死♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14066.en: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Kill all minstrels, watch them fall!<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14066.ja: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「旅芸人っぽいヤツは　皆殺しー！<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14066.ko: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 유랑 예능인 같아 보이는 녀석은 다 죽여야지!<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14066.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>像是旅行艺人的家伙全部杀死！<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14066.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>像是旅行藝人的傢伙全部殺死！<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14067.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Oh geez, this guy again?
What's he trying to prove!<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14067.ja:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「ゲゲッ！　また　こいつか！
　いつかの強そうなヤツだな！<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14067.ko:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 게겟! 또 이 녀석이야!?
　전에 봤던 강해 보이는 녀석이잖아!<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14067.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>呀！又是这家伙！
就是当时看着很强的家伙！<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14067.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>咦咦！又是這傢伙！
就是當時那個看起來很強的傢伙！<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14068.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Okay this guy is getting annoying.
What am I gonna do?<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14068.ja:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「こいつ　うっとうしいな。
　なんかジャマだし　どうしよっか？<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14068.ko:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 이 녀석, 성가시네.
　영 거슬리는데 어떡할까?<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14068.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>这家伙看着好烦啊。
而且很碍事，怎么办呢？<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14068.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>這傢伙看著好煩啊。
而且很礙事，怎麼辦呢？<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14070.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Yeah, okay. I think I'll just take
him down... That's the thing to do!<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14070.ja:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「あの方に　倒してもらうってのは
　いいアイデアっぽくね？<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14070.ko:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 그분한테 해치워 달라고 하는 게 어때?
　괜찮은 생각 아니냐?<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14070.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>我们请那位大人打倒这家伙吧，
这主意不错吧？<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14070.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>我們請那位大人打倒這傢伙吧，
這主意不錯吧？<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14072.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Hey hey hey, it's the minstrels I'm after♪
if I'm not stopped I'll stop their laughter♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14072.ja:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「お～い　ボクたちを止めなかったら
　旅芸人が　いっぱい死んじゃうよ～♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14072.ko:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 이봐~ 우릴 막지 않으면
　유랑 예능인이 계속 죽어 나갈 거다~♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14072.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>喂～如果不阻止我们的话，
会死好多好多旅行艺人哟～♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14072.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>喂～如果不阻止我們，
會死好多好多旅行藝人喔～♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14073.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Kekeke!
If you want to end my minstrel death chorus♪
come to Fostail Square in Muruel Forest♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14073.ja:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「キャッキャ♪　くやしいだろ～。
　なら　森の奥にある
　フォステイル広場に来な～♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14073.ko:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 캬캬♪ 분통 터지지?
　그럼 숲 안쪽에 있는
　포스테일 광장으로 와~♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14073.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>哈哈哈♪很不甘心吧～
那就到森林深处的
福斯迪尔广场来吧♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14073.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>哈哈哈♪很不甘心吧～
那就到森林深處的
福斯迪爾廣場來吧～♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14074.en:
<start_lip_sync n00783 _normal m00001>Why do you do these things?
Are you not a trickster as well?
Why do you hate minstrels so much?<stop_lip_animation n00783 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14074.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00783 _normal m00001>「なぜだ……。お前も　芸をやるんだろ？
　どうして　そこまで旅芸人を憎むんだ……？<stop_lip_animation n00783 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14074.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00783 _normal m00001>: 왜냐……. 너도 예능인이잖아?
　왜 그렇게 유랑 예능인을 증오하지……?<stop_lip_animation n00783 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14074.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00783 _normal m00001>为什么……你不是也在表演吗？
为何如此憎恨旅行艺人？<stop_lip_animation n00783 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14074.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00783 _normal m00001>為什麼……你不是也在表演嗎？
為何如此憎恨旅行藝人……？<stop_lip_animation n00783 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14075.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Kekeke. minstrels are too weak to
truly entertain anyone. How can
such feeble gestures be expected to satisfy?<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14075.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「ククク……。弱すぎて　話にならねえな。
　旅芸人なんか　どいつもこいつもザコばかりだ。
　その程度で　よく人を笑わせられるぜ。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14075.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 큭큭큭……. 너무 약해서 대화가 안 되는군.
　유랑 예능인은 죄다 시원찮은 놈들뿐이야.
　이 실력으로 용케 사람들을 웃기는군.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14075.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……太弱了，根本不是我的对手。
旅行艺人个个都是小人物。
就这种水平居然也能逗别人笑？<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14075.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……太弱了，根本不是我的對手。
旅行藝人個個都是小人物。
就這種水準居然也能逗別人笑？<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14076.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Ah, there he is. There's the tough-looking
minstrel I've been hunting.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14076.ja:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「あー　あいつだ。
　あいつが　手ごわそうな旅芸人です。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14076.ko:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 앗, 그 녀석이다.
　저 녀석이 그 만만찮아 보인다는
　유랑 예능인입니다.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14076.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>啊，是那家伙。
那家伙就是看起来很难对付的旅行艺人。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14076.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>啊──是那傢伙。
那傢伙就是看起來很難對付的旅行藝人。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14077.en: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Mr. Gazer, please do it.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14077.ja: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「ゲイザー様　やっちゃってください。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14077.ko: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 게이저 님, 해치워 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14077.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>盖撒大人，干掉那家伙吧。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14077.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>蓋札大人，請幹掉那傢伙吧。<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14078.en: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Heh heh heh, the minstrel again.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14078.ko: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 헤헤헤, 또 유랑 예능인이군.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14078.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>嘿嘿嘿，又是旅行艺人啊。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14078.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>嘿嘿嘿，又是旅行藝人啊。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14079.en: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>I despise all minstrels!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14079.ja: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「オレは　旅芸人が大嫌いなんだよおおお！！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14079.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我最讨厌旅行艺人啦！！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14079.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我最討厭旅行藝人啦！！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14080.en: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Die, die, die, you!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14080.ko: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 죽어라, 죽어, 죄다 죽어라!!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14080.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>去死去死去死──────！！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14081.en: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>I despise all minstrels!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14081.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我最討厭旅行藝人啦！！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14082.en: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Die, die, die, you!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14082.ja: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「死ね死ね死ねーーーーーい！！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14082.ko: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 죽어라, 죽어, 죄다 죽어라!!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14082.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>去死去死去死──────！！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14083.en: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Gehaha! You're so strong, strong, strong!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14083.ja: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「……ゲハハ！　強い　強い　強い！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14083.ko: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: ……크하하! 강하군, 강해!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14083.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……哇哈哈！好强好强好强！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14083.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……哇哈哈！好強好強好強！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14084.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>You are no minstrel.
Let's hear your true name!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14084.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「お前　ただの旅芸人じゃねえな。
　名前を聞いてやろうじゃねえか！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14084.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 네놈은 평범한 유랑 예능인이 아니군.
　이름이 뭔지 물어봐 주마!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14084.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>你不是一般的旅行艺人。
告诉我你的名字吧！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14084.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>你不是一般的旅行藝人。
告訴我你的名字吧！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14085.en: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>... Gehaha! Now you've done it!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14085.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「……<cs_pchero>か。
　ゲハハ！　イライラさせやがる！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14085.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: ……{cs_pchero}|hpp(이라,라).

14085.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……是<cs_pchero>啊。

14085.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>……是<cs_pchero>啊。
哇哈哈！真讓人心煩！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14086.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>Your form reminds me of my former
master Polfan. I could never forget
master Polfan's form.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14086.ja:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「お前の芸を見てると　思いだすぜ。
　かつての師匠　ポルファンの芸をな。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14086.ko:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 네놈의 개그를 보니 생각난다.
　한때 내 스승이었던 포르판의 개그가.<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14086.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>看到你的技艺我就想起了
以前的师父——珀尔凡的技艺。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14086.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>看到你的技藝我就想起了
以前的師父──珀爾凡的技藝。<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14087.en:
<start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>I will kill you with my own hands
sooner or later!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14087.ja: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>「お前は　いずれ　この手で殺してやる！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14087.ko: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>: 넌 언젠가 내 손으로 죽여 주마!<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14087.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>迟早有一天我要亲手杀死你！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14087.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m13403 _normal m00001>我遲早會親手殺死你！<stop_lip_animation m13403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14088.en: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>Geez! Oh no, oh no!<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14088.ja: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>「げげー！　やばい　やばい！<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14088.ko: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>: 게게! 위험해, 위험해!<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14088.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>呀呀！不好了，不好了！<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14088.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001>呀呀──！不好了，不好了！<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14089.en:
<start_lip_sync m03800 _normal m00001> Begone♪
Begone♪<stop_lip_animation m03800 CLOSE_MOUTH>
